title: Halo Infinite's first hours are PURE FUN - Campaign Gameplay (PC 1440p)
description:
Here's my first experience with Halo Infinite's Campaign! (2 hours and 20 minutes of gameplay edited down to an hour in order to follow the embargo) 

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
